Quick Facts

EXIT   X

DUTIES OF PCBUs

Page

Table of Contents

 

 

PCBUs who carry out particular activities that involve plant, substances or structures have additional duties. This includes:

 

•

designers

•

manufacturers

•

importers

•

suppliers

•

people who install, construct or commission such plant, substances or structures

 

The duties apply in relation to plant, substances or structures that are used at the workplace, or could be reasonably be expected to be.

 

They include:

 

•

designing and manufacturing items to operate without risks to health and safety

•

taking steps to ensure items imported or supplied do not present health and safety risks

•

making sure that plant or structures are installed, constructed or commissioned so that they do not present risks to health and safety

•

carrying out testing or examination to make sure that it is without risk to health or safety

•

providing adequate information so that it can be used safely
